object.name: ForumTopicEdited
object.description: This object represents a service message about an edited forum topic.
object.html_description: This object represents a service message about an edited forum topic.
object.rst_description: This object represents a service message about an edited forum topic.

annotations.description: New name of the topic, if it was edited
annotations.html_description: Optional. New name of the topic, if it was edited
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. New name of the topic, if it was edited
annotations.name: name

annotations.description: New identifier of the custom emoji shown as the topic icon, if it was edited; an empty string if the icon was removed
annotations.html_description: Optional. New identifier of the custom emoji shown as the topic icon, if it was edited; an empty string if the icon was removed
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. New identifier of the custom emoji shown as the topic icon, if it was edited; an empty string if the icon was removed
annotations.name: icon_custom_emoji_id
